Package com.ui.event

Provides common interfaces and classes that manages various types of common events.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ComponentSelectionListener Listener for handling events pertaining to selecting an item from a component.
EventDispatcher An interface for firing events for any component capable of managing the custom event, BaseEvent, or any of its descendents.
 

Class Summary
BaseEvent Common event class for for the commons api.
ComponentItemDoubleClickedEvent An event notification source for detecting when an individual item has been double clicked on a component by the user.
ComponentItemSelectedEvent An event notification source for detecting when an individual row is selected on a given component by the user.
ComponentSelectionEvent A common notification source containing information pertaining to item selection based actions relative to a given component.
EventDispatcherImpl An implementation of EventDispatcher providing the ability to introspect a parent component and invoke one or more of its registered event handlers.
 

Package com.ui.event Description

Provides common interfaces and classes that manages various types of common events.
